title: Robot Sounds - Audio Pack
description: + 100 High Quality Robot Sounds For Your Game!
longDescription:
Hi There!


This is my robot sounds audio pack, really fun to create! I think almost every game has some of this sounds, glitches, alert, attacks, bips, and others, hope you like it!


Full list:


  1. Robot_Alert_01
  2. Robot_Alert_02
  3. Robot_Attack_01
  4. Robot_Attack_02
  5. Robot_Attack_03
  6. Robot_Attack_04
  7. Robot_Attack_05
  8. Robot_Bip_01
  9. Robot_Bip_02
  10. Robot_Bip_03
  11. Robot_Bip_04
  12. Robot_Bip_05
  13. Robot_Confirm_01
  14. Robot_Confirm_02
  15. Robot_Doubt_01
  16. Robot_Doubt_02
  17. Robot_Error_01
  18. Robot_Error_02
  19. Robot_Error_03
  20. Robot_Glitch_01
  21. Robot_Glitch_02
  22. Robot_Glitch_03
  23. Robot_Movement_01
  24. Robot_Movement_02
  25. Robot_Movement_03
  26. Robot_Movement_04
  27. Robot_Movement_05
  28. Robot_Movement_06
  29. Robot_On_01
  30. Robot_On_02
  31. Robot_On_03
  32. Robot_Shut_Down_01
  33. Robot_Shut_Down_02
  34. Robot_Shut_Down_03



All files contain at least 3 variations! And you're getting it for free :D
